subject: Re: does anybody on this group listen to files????
author: UrsaMater
full_text:
I listened to the the Radio Shack Hack files and heard pretty much everything you did.  In 
fact, it was a little easier for me to hear these than the Frank's box 12 files.  At one point, 
you asked if they could use fm too and got a yes and I swear I also heard a thank you 
layered almost under it--maybe my imagination though.  The british ace one was clear as 
a bell. 
I have to say that it is tremendous to hear you having what are real-time (or our time, 
maybe) conversations on these.  Its so cool!  It just struck me strongly today while listening 
to this batch for some reason.

Julie




--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, "bhali333" <paranormalinvestigating@...> wrote:


>
> Come on guy's a little feedback!
> 
> I posted 16 files two day's ago from the RSbox and only got 2 replies 
> and both were from ann.
> 
> I posted a bunch of frank's box files today and not one response.
> 
> lets jump start this group with some new and positive energy everybody 
> do some sessions and post the results, lets start the advance into the 
> future.
> 
> Bruce
>
